alert.note: Alert for Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 8:26PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Doniphan, southwestern Worth, northwestern Daviess, Gentry, southern Atchison, southwestern Harrison, Holt, southern Nodaway, northern Andrew and northwestern DeKalb Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 826 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Craig to 8 miles north of Albany. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Maryville, Albany, Stanberry, Mound City, King City, Oregon, Fairfax, Ravenwood, Pattonsburg, Maitland, Skidmore, Forest City, Craig, Fillmore, White Cloud, Barnard, Conception Junction, Bolckow, Graham and Big Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 77 and 78. Interstate 29 between mile markers 64 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Kansas...and north central and northwestern Missouri.
